name: end_lease
attributes: # [doc = " レースの終了（NFT返却）処理だが、"]
# [doc = " lease_account.lessee と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合検証がない"]
body: let lease = & mut ctx . accounts . lease_account ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . escrow_nft . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: lease_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = lessee)] を指定して返却ユーザーとの照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: escrow_nft
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Escrow に預けられた NFT 用のトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT を受け取るユーザーのトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI 実行権限を持つサービス権限アカウント"]

fields.name: token_program
fields.attribute: # [doc = " SPL トークンプログラム"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を締結した貸し手の Pubkey"]

fields.name: lessee
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を締結した借り手の Pubkey"]

fields.name: active
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 現在のリース状態 (true=貸出中)"]

fields.name: end_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 終了処理を実行した回数"]
